scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.lint: echo "FRONTEND" && cd frontend && npm run lint && echo "BACKEND" && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: echo "FRONTEND" && cd frontend && npm run lint:fix && echo "BACKEND" && cd ../backend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.test: echo "FRONTEND" && cd frontend && npm run test && echo "BACKEND" && cd ../backend && npm run test
